title: Region bounded by algebraic f and line part - c

content.description: Let f be the function given by  \(f\left(x\right)=\frac{x^3}{4}-\frac{x^2}{3}-\frac{x}{2}+3\cos x\). Let R be the shaded region in the second quadrant bounded by the graph of f, and let S be the shaded region bounded by the graph of f and line ℓ, the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 0, as shown above.
content.question: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that can be used to find the area of S.

frqParts.text: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that can be used to find the area of S.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
